select * from sys_menu
and menu_name like '%${menuName}%'

select distinct sys_menu.perms from sys_menu left join sys_role_menu on sys_menu.menu_id = sys_role_menu.menu_id left join sys_user_role on sys_role_menu.role_id = sys_user_role.role_id where sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct sys_menu.menu_id, sys_menuparent_id, sys_menu.menu_name, sys_menu.url, sys_menu.visible, ifnull(sys_menu.perms,'') as perms, sys_menu.target, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.order_num, sys_menu.create_time from sys_menu left join sys_role_menu on sys_menu.menu_id = sys_role_menu.menu_id left join sys_user_role on sys_role_menu.role_id = sys_user_role.role_id left join sys_role on sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id where sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} order by sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.order_num
